ing.item: Fermented black beans; rinsed and drained

directions.step:
From: "S. Schwartz" <honn@icanect.net>
Date: Thu, 18 Apr 1996 13:31:06 -0400
Recipe By: Sun-Sentinel (4-11-96) Heat a wok or heavy skillet over medium-high heat. Add the oil, the black beans and garlic. Stir-fry about 12 seconds. Add the rest of the ingredients and stir-fry about 1 minute or until sauce thickens. Makes about 3/4 cup sauce.
Serving Ideas : Serve with poultry, fish or veggies.
NOTES : Black beans and rice wine and readily available in Asian markets and some supermarkets. You may substitute dry white vermouth for the rice wine.
